channel.title: P1 on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in P1 on Praveen Lobo

item.title: A Week That Was
item.description: Last week was the crappiest of all, but it ended in a good note. It oscillated between okay to bad, bad to worse, and back to okay and then to good. First two days were uneventful and I had no clue of what lie ahead. Wednesday was the beginning. Firstly, a brand new system welcomed me to office on Wednesday morning; they had formatted my machine without any kind of confirmation.
